Project Description
SharePoint Conditional Field is working like a KPI field. You can specify your own criterias and their results with combining them with SharePoint field values.

FEATURES
  • Allows user to add html content for different conditions
  • Allows user to add another field value into content

Installation Prerequisites
SharePoint 2007

HOWTO

How to create a conditional field

Features will be added
  • Text Editor will be replaced with Rich Text Editor
